TopicTitle: parts strut together acts as 1 part (lag sulotion)

Articles.Content: Ksp is a game where you can build anything, the only limiting factor would be that the lags get out of control in large ships. The greatest lag reducer must be UbioZur Welding mod. The concept is simple, it makes mutiple parts behave as one part, greatly lowering the physic calculation. This is also useful for ships that are to fragile and break apart easily. This should be included into stock somehow, but without the clumsy menu UI. This mod does the job of struts of holding stuff togteher, but is better as it also lowers lag and improve fps! Naturally we use should upgrade our struts with this technology!

Hmmm. I'm not sure how kludgy this would feel in practice. Don't strutted parts still move independently? Removing that might make it too easily exploitable, but I would have to see it in practice to know that for sure.
KJR is good as well. I never liked having to add struts to otherwise rocket-looking rockets.
well maybe KJR should be stock as well, making that there no needs for struts other than for this fuction

Id say teh best way to bandaid fix the part count would be procedural parts (fuel tanks, wings, ect). While i personally prefer more fuel tanks instead of one solid one, pat coumnt right now is too annoying.
